org.jooby

Interface Parser.Context

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Parser.Builder
    Enclosing interface:
    Parser

    public static interface Parser.Context
extends Parser.Builder
    Allows you to access to parsing strategies, content type view type() and invoke next parser in the chain via next() methods.
    Since:
    0.6.0
    Author:
    edgar

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Object next()
      Invoke next parser in the chain.
      Object next(com.google.inject.TypeLiteral<?> type)
      Invoke next parser in the chain and switch/change the target type we are looking for.
      Object next(com.google.inject.TypeLiteral<?> type, Object data)
      Invoke next parser in the chain and switch/change the target type we are looking for but also the current value.
      <T> T require(Class<T> type)
      Requires a service with the given type.
      <T> T require(com.google.inject.Key<T> key)
      Requires a service with the given type.
      <T> T require(com.google.inject.TypeLiteral<T> type)
      Requires a service with the given type.
      MediaType type()
      Content Type header, if current context was bind to a HTTP body via Request.body().

      • Methods inherited from interface org.jooby.Parser.Builder

        body, ifbody, ifparam, ifparams, ifupload, param, params, upload

        Requires a service with the given type.

        T - Service type.
        Parameters:
        type - Service type.
        Returns:

      • require

        <T> T require(com.google.inject.Key<T> key)
        Requires a service with the given type.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Service type.
        Parameters:
        key - Service key.
        Returns:
        A service.

      • type

        MediaType type()
        Content Type header, if current context was bind to a HTTP body via Request.body(). If current context was bind to a HTTP param, media type is set to text/plain.
        Returns:
        Current type.

      • next

        Object next()
     throws Throwable
        Invoke next parser in the chain.
        Returns:
        A parsed value.
        Throws:
        Exception - An err with a 400 status.
        Throwable

      • next

        Object next(com.google.inject.TypeLiteral<?> type)
     throws Throwable
        Invoke next parser in the chain and switch/change the target type we are looking for. Useful for generic containers classes, like collections or optional values.
        Parameters:
        type - A new type to use.
        Returns:
        A parsed value.
        Throws:
        Exception - An err with a 400 status.
        Throwable

      • next

        Object next(com.google.inject.TypeLiteral<?> type,
            Object data)
     throws Throwable
        Invoke next parser in the chain and switch/change the target type we are looking for but also the current value. Useful for generic containers classes, like collections or optional values.
        Parameters:
        type - A new type to use.
        data - Data to be parsed.
        Returns:
        A parsed value.
        Throws:
        Exception - An err with a 400 status.
        Throwable
